changeSet.author: glasir
changeSet.sql:
-- @version $ $
create table dss_user_bpmarkers ( marker_id varchar2(40) not null, profile_id varchar2(40) not null, marker_key varchar2(100) not null, marker_value varchar2(100) null, marker_data varchar2(100) null, creation_date timestamp null, version number(10) not null, marker_type number(10) null ,constraint dssprofilebp_p primary key (marker_id,profile_id));
